The large bird lands besides the pod and transforms.

Tyrael: Looks like I have come just in time... Hopefully, it will 
accept this.

He produced a special circuitry board from a case on his right flank. 
he inserted it in the pod's computer and waited. It was a 
techno-organic upgrade board that would allow the bot to become one 
made of millions of electronic cells. Tripredacus scientists had 
worked hard to perfect the new transforming mode, but the results 
given were well worth it. Of course, in this case, there was no 
guarantee the pod would even accept the upgrade, but it would 
undoubtedly make the transformer a Tripredacus.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> 
> the pod scans for lifeforms and finds a cheetah
>  warriorazure wrote:In the Tripredacus base, the computer rings out 
an alarm. the 
> proximity of the falling pod was dangerously close.
> 
> Computer: Alert, Alert. Incoming pod. Shield defenses online.
> 
> Tyrael turned back to the holotable.
> 
> Tyrael: What? A pod? Landing so near? Computer, generate geographic 
> landscape with location of the pod.
> 
> The pod had touched down a mere 200 meters roughly westward from the 
> base.
> 
> Tyrael: Lower shields. Crusher, I will go out. Bring them up after 
I'm 
> gone. I don't plan to take too long.
> 
> He transforms to phoenix mode and flies out. Given the proximity, he 
> arrives in no time.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "lordofdarkness11001" <lordofdarkness11001@y...> 
> wrote:
